parameters.query:
SELECT 
    SN.SiteNoticeID,
    SN.Issued_To,
    SN.Issue_To_Email,
    SN.Created,
    SN.CreatedBy,
    SN.Open_Days,
    SN.Status,
    SN.Project_ID,
    SNI.Notice_ID,
    SNI.Site_Notice_ID,
    SNI.Sign_Off_Status,
    SNI.List_ID,
    STRING_AGG(pl1.EmailAddress, ', ') AS ccRecipients,
    P.Project_Name,    -- To get the Project Name
    pl2.EmailAddress AS Created_Person_Email    -- To get the Created Person's Email
FROM 
    Site_Notices AS SN
JOIN 
    Site_Notice_Items AS SNI
ON 
    SN.SiteNoticeID = SNI.Site_Notice_ID
LEFT JOIN
    escalationReceivers AS ER
ON
    SN.SiteNoticeID = ER.ownedSnid AND ER.[3days] = 1
LEFT JOIN
    People_List AS pl1
ON
    ER.ownedPerson = pl1.Person_ID
LEFT JOIN
    People_List AS pl2    -- Join with People_List table to get the Created Person's Email
ON
    SN.Created_PersonID = pl2.Person_ID
JOIN
    Projects AS P    -- Join with Projects table to get the Project Name
ON
    SN.Project_ID = P.Project_ID
WHERE 
    SN.Status <> 3
AND
    SNI.Sign_Off_Status <> 3
GROUP BY 
    SN.SiteNoticeID,
    SN.Issued_To,
    SN.Issue_To_Email,
    SN.Created,
    SN.CreatedBy,
    SN.Open_Days,
    SN.Status,
    SN.Project_ID,
    SNI.Notice_ID,
    SNI.Site_Notice_ID,
    SNI.Sign_Off_Status,
    SNI.List_ID,
    P.Project_Name,    -- Group by the Project Name
    pl2.EmailAddress;  -- Group by the Created Person's Email

SELECT er.*, pl1.First_Name, pl1.Last_Name, pl1.EmailAddress AS Receiver_Email, p.Project_Name, pl2.EmailAddress AS Created_Person_Email
FROM escalationReceivers er
JOIN Site_Notices sn ON er.ownedSnid = sn.SiteNoticeID
JOIN People_List pl1 ON er.ownedPerson = pl1.Person_ID
JOIN Projects p ON sn.Project_ID = p.Project_ID
JOIN People_List pl2 ON sn.Created_PersonID = pl2.Person_ID
WHERE er.ownedSnid = {{ $input.first().json.Site_Notice_ID }} AND er.[5days] = 1;

SELECT er.*, pl1.First_Name, pl1.Last_Name, pl1.EmailAddress AS Receiver_Email, p.Project_Name, pl2.EmailAddress AS Created_Person_Email
FROM escalationReceivers er
JOIN Site_Notices sn ON er.ownedSnid = sn.SiteNoticeID
JOIN People_List pl1 ON er.ownedPerson = pl1.Person_ID
JOIN Projects p ON sn.Project_ID = p.Project_ID
JOIN People_List pl2 ON sn.Created_PersonID = pl2.Person_ID
WHERE er.ownedSnid = {{ $input.first().json.Site_Notice_ID }} AND er.[9days] = 1;

SELECT er.*, pl1.First_Name, pl1.Last_Name, pl1.EmailAddress AS Receiver_Email, p.Project_Name, pl2.EmailAddress AS Created_Person_Email
FROM escalationReceivers er
JOIN Site_Notices sn ON er.ownedSnid = sn.SiteNoticeID
JOIN People_List pl1 ON er.ownedPerson = pl1.Person_ID
JOIN Projects p ON sn.Project_ID = p.Project_ID
JOIN People_List pl2 ON sn.Created_PersonID = pl2.Person_ID
WHERE er.ownedSnid = {{ $input.first().json.Site_Notice_ID }} AND er.[10days] = 1;

SELECT er.*, pl1.First_Name, pl1.Last_Name, pl1.EmailAddress AS Receiver_Email, p.Project_Name, pl2.EmailAddress AS Created_Person_Email
FROM escalationReceivers er
JOIN Site_Notices sn ON er.ownedSnid = sn.SiteNoticeID
JOIN People_List pl1 ON er.ownedPerson = pl1.Person_ID
JOIN Projects p ON sn.Project_ID = p.Project_ID
JOIN People_List pl2 ON sn.Created_PersonID = pl2.Person_ID
WHERE er.ownedSnid = {{ $json["Site_Notice_ID"] }} AND er.[3days] = 1;
